description:
Because you can't stalk people when they live thousands of miles away. Mobile Guy makes it easier to do exactly that for one of the most highly desired tech men in America. 

Mobile Guy is the very first app in the catalog available for webOS that shows exclusive content from Tim Stiffler-Dean [a.k.a. AnotherGuy] and his many contributions around the web. Get the latest tech gadget news from daily updates on his blog, catch up with him on nearly a dozen social networks and websites, get tips on where to go for cool webOS stuff on the web & get to know some of the best App developers in AnotherGuy's community. All without ever having to look up from your phone.

Just be careful, though. Using this app can make AnotherGuy become unbearably difficult NOT to look at. Just wait until we add his photo stream to the list of features....
